321060.name: Gender Bender DNA Twister Extreme
321060.description:
Gender Bender DNA Twister Extreme is a crazy visual novel that follows a cast of characters that have their genders flipped due to unforeseen and ridiculous circumstances. Pick a character from a massive cast and follow their unique stories as they find romance and experience a range of outrageous transformations.

Features
  • Thirteen Playable Characters, with unique NPCs, love interests and endings
  • An ongoing storyline that evolves with each new playable character
  • Early routes are modelled after dating sims, with the player presented with a number of choices to choose from
  • Later routes feature playable puzzle sections, courtroom investigation scenes and full on adventure game sections
  • Approximately 40 Hours Of Content. In total the game is over 375,000 words long
  • Over 40 unique NPCs and Characters, not counting all of the ridiculous transformations
  • Dozens of ridiculous transformations! Snake girls, mermaids, sentient blobs of slimes...
  • Great reviews from players!
